name: Dalay - Nicaragua - Robusto
additionalNotes: Somm Cigars is a German company based in Saarbr√ºcken, near the border with France. The brand prides itself on sharing its passion for good cigars and offers a unique social experience for those who share their love for cigars. Their focus is on the taste of tobacco, and they promote the diversity of tastes among their followers, offering cigar tastings on YouTube to inspire other fans. They also highlight that they offer exclusive specialties that are only sold in Germany.
